definition: white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to play the role of the villain (idiom)
erhua variant of 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3]
(bird species of China) Przevalski's nuthatch (Sitta przewalskii)
(bird species of China) white-faced heron (Egretta novaehollandiae)

sentences.english: Is there a subtle good-cop, bad-cop routine playing out?
sentences.chinese: 这是一场微妙的红白脸闹剧吗？

sentences.english: Gold and white face has black Arabic numerals.
sentences.chinese: 黄金和白脸黑色阿拉伯语或罗马数字。

sentences.english: Do not believe the sweet words of that fair-faced man.
sentences.chinese: 不要相信那个小白脸的甜言蜜语。

sentences.english: I am of fair complextion, and find that the blush ivory works well with my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我有一张白脸，发现粉象牙对我很适合。

sentences.english: I think you may deign to marry me. I don't want to be an Adonis.
sentences.chinese: 你要屈尊下嫁，我可不想当小白脸儿。

sentences.english: Who is that, you don't blather .
sentences.chinese: 谁是那小白脸，你可别乱说。

sentences.english: That dragon lady have three gigolo under her husbands nose.
sentences.chinese: 那位女强人当着丈夫的面，公开有三位小白脸。

sentences.english: How do you know a gigolo ?
Why should I do that? Take the smile to you, you give me.
sentences.chinese: 我这样是何必？拿笑脸给你，你还白脸给我。

sentences.english: The little white-faced account of her cheap, dingy places to escape.
sentences.chinese: 那小白脸占了她的便宜，也灰溜溜地逃走了。

sentences.english: CAO Cao in Peking Opera has a face painted white, which symbolizes "treachery".
sentences.chinese: 在京剧表演中，曹操的脸谱通常是象征着狡诈的白脸。
媚兰的白脸变得了徘红。

sentences.english: We"ll go to prison, and you"ll be someones bitch.
sentences.chinese: 我们会进监狱，你会成为某人的小白脸。

sentences.english: She ran away with a small white face.
sentences.chinese: 她和一个小白脸一起跑了。

sentences.english: They quite often have their own "boytoys".
sentences.chinese: 而且通常她们也有自己的“小白脸”。

sentences.english: Is this small pearly face, injury he this big half month all and the wife is in Cold War.
sentences.chinese: 就是这个小白脸，害得他这大个半月都跟老婆在冷战。

definition: yellow face (due to sickness etc)/yellow-skinned people
erhua variant of 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3]
lit. pale-faced scholar (idiom); young and inexperienced person without practical experience/still wet behind the ears
(Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing
see 老頭子|老头子[lao3 tou2 zi5]
